mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_GROUP_JOIN (SG_NO, USER_NO, SG_LEVEL, SGJ_DATE) VALUES(#{sg_no}, #{user_no}, #{sg_level}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: select * from STUDY_GROUP_JOIN where USER_NO = #{user_no} and SG_NO = #{sg_no};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDY_GROUP_JOIN WHERE user_no = #{user_no} AND sg_no = #{sg_no}
SELECT * FROM STUDY_GROUP_JOIN SGJ LEFT JOIN STUDY_GROUP SG ON SGJ.SG_NO = SG.SG_NO where SGJ.USER_NO = #{user_no};

SELECT HW_HIS.*, HW.*, U.USER_NAME FROM HOMEWORK_HISTORY HW_HIS LEFT JOIN HOMEWORK HW ON HW.HOMEWORK_NO = HW_HIS.HOMEWORK_NO LEFT JOIN USER U ON HW.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE HW_HIS.USER_NO = #{user_no}
SELECT SG.*, GC.* FROM STUDY_GROUP SG LEFT JOIN GAME_CONTENT GC ON SG.GAME_NO = GC.GAME_NO limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
SELECT SG.*, U.USER_LEVEL FROM STUDY_GROUP SG LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM USER WHERE USER_NO = #{user_no}) U ON SG.USER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE SG.SG_LEVEL = #{user_level};
